description: - NewInfrared Remote Control for Sony Digital SLR Cameras- Compatible with :-Sony Alphaseries DSLR cameras:  A33, A57, A65, A77, A99, A900, A700, A580, A560, A550, A500, A450, A390, A380, A330, A290 A230.-Sony NEXseries compact cameras: NEX-7, NEX-6, NEX-5 .- The robust remote control supports a large number of features (releasing, zoom etc.) that may vary from camera model to camera model. More information can be found in your camera instruction manual.- The remote control is powered by a three-volt CR2025 lithium battery.- RM-S1 replaces SONY RMT-DSLR1 and RMT-DSLR2 remote commander.- With this remote you can shoot images using the shutter release option or with a two second shutter release option.- Using the start/stop button you are able to control movie recording. (Can only be used if the camera supports movie recording)- Operation distance: 1cm-10meters- Dimensions: Approx. 55 X 32 X 6 mm- Compact and light. Great for any occasion.- Operating temperature: 0 C to 40 C (32 F to 104 F)- Storage temperature: -20C to +60 C (-4 F to 140F)- PremiumMagicFiber Microfiber Cleaning Cloth- Ultra gentle! Extremely fine microfiber leaves zero scratches, streaks or marks. Safe for all lenses.- Ideal for cleaning oil and dirt off eyeglasses, iPhone/iPad and other touch screens, binocular lenses, digital SLR and other camera lenses, GPS devices, and other delicate optics.- Great value for your money. Reusable and long lasting. No more paper towel and tissue waste.- Size: 6 x 7 inches (15cm x 18cm)- Each microfiber is individually and neatly packed in it's own polyurethane plastic bag for long term safekeeping.
title: IR Wireless Remote Control (RMT-DSLR1 and RMT-DSLR2 Replacement) for SONY Alpha Series A33, A57, A65, A77, A99, A900, A700, A580, A550, A500, A450, A390, A380, A330, A230 DSLR Cameras and NEX-7, NEX-6, NEX-5 Compact Cameras + MagicFiber Microfiber Lens Cleaning Cloth
